WorkItem.Description: I am trying to install the March 25 version on an older PC running Windows 7 Pro.  The PC has 2GB of PC3200 RAM, an Anthlon XP 3200+ CPU, and an nVidia FX5500 AGP card.  Are there hardware minimum requirements for the install?  I keep getting "Wabbitemu Z80 Emulator has stopped working" and problem details show "Appcrash".  Any advice would be appreciated.

Comments.Message: I also can't install Wabbitemu. I create a ROM image using open source software, I choose the TI-84 SE, I select the download OS files from IT's website. When I click on finish I am asked to save the file. I chose the file name given and it goes back to the OS Selection window and then I get a "program not responding" message. I have Windows 8.2 and 8.00 GB of RAM with an Intel Core i5 Processor. It should work.
